alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Harrison (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of EAST CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following counties, Bourbon, Harrison and Nicholas. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 824 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cynthiana, Breckinridge, Berry, Poindexter, Oddville, Garnett, Venus, Robinson, Kelat and Colville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
